match.subtitle: Do the dead frighten you
match.quote: Do the dead frighten you

match.subtitle: Your dead men seem to have moved camp
match.quote: Your dead men seem to have moved camp Will

match.subtitle: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon
match.quote: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon the First of his Name King of the Andals and the Rhoynar and the First Men Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm by the word of Eddard of the House Stark Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North I do sentence you to die

match.subtitle: the first of his name Dont look away

match.subtitle: the first of his name Dont look away

match.subtitle: sentence you to die

match.subtitle: You did well
match.quote: You did well

match.subtitle: You understand why I did it
match.quote: Do you understand why I did it

match.subtitle: Its a freak
match.quote: A freak

match.subtitle: Its a direwolf
match.quote: Thats a direwolf They grow larger than the other kind

match.subtitle: There are no direwolves south of the Wall
match.quote: Theres not been a direwolf sighted south of the Wall in two hundred years

match.subtitle: Now there are five
match.quote: There are five of them

match.subtitle: There are five pups
match.quote: There are five pups

match.subtitle: The direwolf is the sigil of your house
match.quote: Three sons two daughters The direwolf is the sigil of your House Your children were meant to have these pups my lord

match.subtitle: They were meant to have them
match.quote: Three sons two daughters The direwolf is the sigil of your House Your children were meant to have these pups my lord

match.subtitle: You will train them yourselves
match.quote: You must train them as well

match.subtitle: You will feed them yourselves
match.quote: Easy to say and harder to do I will not have you wasting the servants time with this If you want these pups you will feed them yourselves Is that understood

match.subtitle: Im not a Stark
match.quote: I am no Stark Father

match.subtitle: What is it
match.quote: What is it Jon

match.subtitle: I am so sorry my love
match.quote: I am so sorry my love Jon Arryn is dead

match.subtitle: Jon Arryn is dead
match.quote: I am so sorry my love Jon Arryn is dead

match.subtitle: Your sister the boy They both have their health
match.quote: Your sister

match.subtitle: The king rides for Winterfell
match.quote: The letter had other tidings The king is riding to Winterfell to seek you out

match.subtitle: Guarding the North for you Your Grace Winterfell is yours
match.quote: Your Grace Winterfell is yours

match.subtitle: Take me to your crypt I want to pay my respects
match.quote: Take me down to your crypt Eddard I would pay my respects

match.subtitle: Tell me about Jon Arryn
match.quote: Tell me about Jon

match.subtitle: burned right through him whatever it was
match.quote: I have never seen a man sicken so quickly We gave a tourney on my sons name day If you had seen Jon then you would have sworn he would live forever A fortnight later he was dead The sickness was like a fire in his gut It burned right through him

match.subtitle: I loved that man
match.quote: I loved that old man

match.subtitle: We both did
match.quote: We both did

match.subtitle: I need you Ned
match.quote: I have need of you Ned

match.subtitle: Lord Eddard Stark
match.quote: Lord Eddard Stark I would name you the Hand of the King

match.subtitle: I would name you the Hand of the King
match.quote: Lord Eddard Stark I would name you the Hand of the King

match.subtitle: Im not worthy of the honor
match.quote: I am not worthy of the honor

match.subtitle: Im trying to get you to run my kingdom
match.quote: If I wanted to honor you Id let you retire I am planning to make you run the kingdom and fight the wars while I eat and drink and wench myself into an early grave

match.subtitle: while I eat drink and whore my way to an early grave
match.quote: If I wanted to honor you Id let you retire I am planning to make you run the kingdom and fight the wars while I eat and drink and wench myself into an early grave

match.subtitle: Damn it Ned stand up
match.quote: Damn it Ned

match.subtitle: You helped me win the Iron Throne
match.quote: You helped me win this damnable throne now help me hold it We were meant to rule together If Lyanna had lived we should have been brothers bound by blood as well as affection Well it is not too late I have a son You have a daughter My Joff and your Sansa shall join our houses as Lyanna and I might once have done

match.subtitle: now help me keep the damn thing
match.quote: You helped me win this damnable throne now help me hold it We were meant to rule together If Lyanna had lived we should have been brothers bound by blood as well as affection Well it is not too late I have a son You have a daughter My Joff and your Sansa shall join our houses as Lyanna and I might once have done

match.subtitle: We were meant to rule together
match.quote: You helped me win this damnable throne now help me hold it We were meant to rule together If Lyanna had lived we should have been brothers bound by blood as well as affection Well it is not too late I have a son You have a daughter My Joff and your Sansa shall join our houses as Lyanna and I might once have done

match.subtitle: If your sister had lived wed have been bound by blood
match.quote: You helped me win this damnable throne now help me hold it We were meant to rule together If Lyanna had lived we should have been brothers bound by blood as well as affection Well it is not too late I have a son You have a daughter My Joff and your Sansa shall join our houses as Lyanna and I might once have done

match.quote: You helped me win this damnable throne now help me hold it We were meant to rule together If Lyanna had lived we should have been brothers bound by blood as well as affection Well it is not too late I have a son You have a daughter My Joff and your Sansa shall join our houses as Lyanna and I might once have done

match.quote: You helped me win this damnable throne now help me hold it We were meant to rule together If Lyanna had lived we should have been brothers bound by blood as well as affection Well it is not too late I have a son You have a daughter My Joff and your Sansa shall join our houses as Lyanna and I might once have done

match.subtitle: Did you have to bury her in a place like this
match.quote: Ah damn it Ned did you have to bury her in a place like this

match.subtitle: She should be on a hill somewhere
match.quote: She should be on a hill somewhere under a fruit tree with the sun and clouds above her and the rain to wash her clean

match.subtitle: with the sun and the clouds above her
match.quote: She should be on a hill somewhere under a fruit tree with the sun and clouds above her and the rain to wash her clean

match.subtitle: This is where she belongs
match.quote: This is her place

match.subtitle: In my dreams I kill him every night
match.quote: In my dreams I kill him every night

match.subtitle: Look a gift from Illyrio
match.quote: A gift from the Magister Illyrio

match.subtitle: Touch it
match.quote: This is beauty Touch it Go on Caress the fabric

match.subtitle: Go on feel the fabric
match.quote: This is beauty Touch it Go on Caress the fabric

match.subtitle: Illyrios no fool
match.quote: Illyrio is no fool

match.subtitle: He knows I wont forget my friends
match.quote: The magister knows that I will not forget my friends when I come into my throne

match.subtitle: when I come into my throne
match.quote: The magister knows that I will not forget my friends when I come into my throne

match.subtitle: You still slouch
match.quote: You still slouch Straighten yourself

match.subtitle: Let them see
match.quote: Let them see that you have a womans shape now

match.subtitle: You have a womans body now
match.quote: Let them see that you have a womans shape now

match.subtitle: You dont want to wake the dragon do you
match.quote: You will not fail me tonight If you do it will go hard for you You dont want to wake the dragon do you

match.subtitle: No
match.quote: No

match.quote: When they write the history of my reign sweet sister they will say that it began tonight

match.subtitle: they will say it began today
match.quote: When they write the history of my reign sweet sister they will say that it began tonight

match.quote: You see how long it is

match.subtitle: When Dothraki are defeated in combat
match.quote: When Dothraki are defeated in combat they cut off their braids in disgrace so the world will know their shame Khal Drogo has never lost a fight He is Aegon the Dragonlord come again and you will be his queen

match.subtitle: they cut off their braid so the whole world can see their shame
match.quote: When Dothraki are defeated in combat they cut off their braids in disgrace so the world will know their shame Khal Drogo has never lost a fight He is Aegon the Dragonlord come again and you will be his queen

match.subtitle: Khal Drogo has never been defeated

match.subtitle: Do you take me for a fool
match.quote: Do you take me for a fool

match.subtitle: I take you for a king

match.quote: I dont want to be his queen

match.subtitle: I want to go home
match.quote: Please please Viserys I dont want to I want to go home

match.subtitle: how do we go home
match.quote: How are we to go home

match.subtitle: I dont know
match.quote: I dont know

match.subtitle: We go home with an army
match.quote: We go home with an army sweet sister With Khal Drogos army that is how we go home And if you must wed him and bed him for that you will

match.subtitle: With Khal Drogos army
match.quote: We go home with an army sweet sister With Khal Drogos army that is how we go home And if you must wed him and bed him for that you will

match.subtitle: I would let his whole tribe fuck you
match.quote: Id let his whole khalasar fuck you if need be sweet sister all forty thousand men and their horses too if that was what it took to get my army Be grateful it is only Drogo In time you may even learn to like him Now dry your eyes Illyrio is bringing him over and he will not see you crying

match.subtitle: all 40000 men and their horses too
match.quote: Id let his whole khalasar fuck you if need be sweet sister all forty thousand men and their horses too if that was what it took to get my army Be grateful it is only Drogo In time you may even learn to like him Now dry your eyes Illyrio is bringing him over and he will not see you crying

match.subtitle: if thats what it took
match.quote: Id let his whole khalasar fuck you if need be sweet sister all forty thousand men and their horses too if that was what it took to get my army Be grateful it is only Drogo In time you may even learn to like him Now dry your eyes Illyrio is bringing him over and he will not see you crying

match.subtitle: Lady Stark thought it might insult the royal family
match.quote: But tonight Lady Stark thought it might give insult to the royal family to seat a bastard among them

match.subtitle: to seat a bastard in their midst
match.quote: But tonight Lady Stark thought it might give insult to the royal family to seat a bastard among them

match.subtitle: So take me with you when you go back
match.quote: Take me with you when you go back to the Wall

match.subtitle: Jon Father will let me if you ask him
match.quote: Father will give me leave to go if you ask him I know he will

match.subtitle: I know he will
match.quote: Father will give me leave to go if you ask him I know he will

match.subtitle: Im ready to swear your oath
match.quote: I am ready to swear your oath

match.subtitle: You dont understand what youd be giving up
match.quote: Not a man not yet Until you have known a woman you cannot understand what you would be giving up

match.subtitle: We have no families
match.quote: You dont know what youre asking Jon The Nights Watch is a sworn brotherhood We have no families None of us will ever father sons Our wife is duty Our mistress is honor

match.subtitle: None of us will ever father sons I dont care about that
match.quote: You dont know what youre asking Jon The Nights Watch is a sworn brotherhood We have no families None of us will ever father sons Our wife is duty Our mistress is honor

match.subtitle: None of us will ever father sons I dont care about that
match.quote: I dont care about that

match.subtitle: You might if you knew what it meant
match.quote: You might if you knew what it meant

match.subtitle: What are you doing back there
match.quote: What are you doing up there Why arent you at the feast

match.subtitle: And you youre Ned Starks bastard arent you
match.quote: Youre Ned Starks bastard arent you

match.subtitle: Did I offend you Sorry
match.quote: Did I offend you

match.subtitle: You are the bastard though
match.quote: You are the bastard though

match.subtitle: Lord Eddard Stark is my father
match.quote: Lord Eddard Stark is my father

match.subtitle: Let me give you some advice bastard
match.quote: Let me give you some counsel bastard

match.subtitle: Never forget what you are
match.quote: Never forget what you are for surely the world will not Make it your strength Then it can never be your weakness Armor yourself in it and it will never be used to hurt you

match.subtitle: The rest of the world will not
match.quote: Never forget what you are for surely the world will not Make it your strength Then it can never be your weakness Armor yourself in it and it will never be used to hurt you

match.subtitle: and it can never be used to hurt you
match.quote: Never forget what you are for surely the world will not Make it your strength Then it can never be your weakness Armor yourself in it and it will never be used to hurt you

match.subtitle: What the hell do you know about being a bastard
match.quote: What do you know about being a bastard

match.subtitle: All dwarves are bastards in their fathers eyes
match.quote: All dwarfs are bastards in their fathers eyes

match.subtitle: Its Maester Luwin my lord
match.quote: My lord Maester Luwin is without and begs urgent audience

match.subtitle: Send him in
match.quote: Very well Send him in

match.quote: My lord

match.subtitle: She says Jon Arryn was murdered
match.quote: Lysa says Jon Arryn was murdered

match.subtitle: By the Lannisters
match.quote: The Lannisters

match.subtitle: She doesnt know what shes saying
match.quote: Your sister is sick with grief She cannot know what she is saying

match.subtitle: Your father and brother rode south once
match.quote: My father went south once to answer the summons of a king He never came home again

match.subtitle: A different time
match.quote: A different time

match.subtitle: A different king
match.quote: A different king

match.subtitle: If Khal Drogo has promised you a crown you shall have it
match.quote: I have told you all is settled Trust me The khal has promised you a crown and you shall have it

match.subtitle: When When their omens favor war
match.quote: He will have the girl first and after they are wed he must make his procession across the plains and present her to the dosh khaleen at Vaes Dothrak After that perhaps If the omens favor war

match.subtitle: I piss on Dothraki omens
match.quote: I piss on Dothraki omens The Usurper sits on my fathers throne How long must I wait

match.quote: A Dothraki wedding without at least three deaths is deemed a dull affair

match.quote: No
